definitions.definition: known to be real and what somebody claims it is and not a copy

examples.text: I don't know if the painting is authentic.
an authentic account of life in the desert
the authentic voice of young black Americans

definitions.definition: made to be exactly the same as the original

examples.text: an authentic model of the ancient town
Take a trip on an authentic Spanish galleon to the famous Papagayo beach.

wordOrigin: late Middle English: via Old French from late Latin authenticus, from Greek authentikos ‘principal, genuine’.
